name: The Chicken & The Chick
description:
Go head to head with friends and family in this local multiplayer experience. Race through 5 unique levels utilizing random power-ups and traps to reach the end first.

Controls

Supports XBOX 1, XBOX 360 and PS3 controllers.

Control

XBOX Input

PS3 Input

Movement

Left Joystick

Left Joystick

X

Interact

X

Sqr

Place trap/Use power-up

Y

Tri

Pause

Start

Menu Controls:

Control

XBOX Input

PS3 Input

Confirm

A

X

Back

B

Circle

Navigate menu elements

Left Joystick

Left Joystick

Chicken & The Chick was an individual second year project intended to explore local multiplayer and controller support.
